metadata.title: CVE-2020-14939 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in savestruct_internal.c in FreedroidRPG 1.0rc2. Saved game files are composed of Lua scripts that recover a game's state. A file can be modified to put any Lua code inside, leading to arbitrary code execution while loading.

criterions.comment: freedroidrpg package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
